{"id":901966127,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"17 hours, 6 minutes","timestamp":1676948888,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"9 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/901966127/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"42.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        int windowStart = 0;\n        int longestSubstring = 0;\n        Map<Character, Integer> frequency = new HashMap<>();\n        for (int windowEnd = 0; windowEnd < s.length(); windowEnd++) {\n            char rightLetter = s.charAt(windowEnd);\n            frequency.put(rightLetter, frequency.getOrDefault(rightLetter, 0) + 1);\n            while (frequency.get(rightLetter) > 1) {\n                char leftLetter = s.charAt(windowStart);\n                frequency.put(leftLetter, frequency.get(leftLetter) - 1);\n                if (frequency.get(leftLetter) == 0) {\n                    frequency.remove(leftLetter);\n                }\n                windowStart++;\n            }\n            longestSubstring = Math.max(longestSubstring, windowEnd - windowStart + 1);\n        }\n        return longestSubstring;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
